title: Jaipur
description: The Pink City, known for its royal palaces, forts, and vibrant culture.
reviewSummary: Rich in culture and history, Jaipur is a must-visit for heritage lovers.

landmarks.name: Amer Fort
landmarks.description: A majestic fort with beautiful architecture and panoramic views.

landmarks.name: Hawa Mahal
landmarks.description: The iconic Palace of Winds with its unique honeycomb façade.

landmarks.name: City Palace
landmarks.description: Royal residence with museums and courtyards.

landmarks.name: Jal Mahal
landmarks.description: Water palace located in the middle of Man Sagar Lake.

activities.name: Elephant Ride at Amer Fort
activities.description: Ride elephants up the ramparts of Amer Fort.

activities.name: Heritage Walk
activities.description: Explore old markets, temples, and havelis with a guide.

activities.name: Local Cuisine Tour
activities.description: Taste authentic Rajasthani dishes in traditional eateries.

activities.name: Shopping in Johari Bazaar
activities.description: Buy traditional jewelry, textiles, and handicrafts.

healthAndSafety: Carry basic medications; avoid street food if unsure.
aiGeneratedSummary: Jaipur offers a royal experience with its stunning forts, palaces, and rich culture, perfect for heritage lovers and adventurers alike.

title: Udaipur
description: The City of Lakes, renowned for its palaces, serene lakes, and romantic ambiance.
reviewSummary: A romantic getaway surrounded by lakes and royal architecture.

landmarks.name: Lake Pichola
landmarks.description: Scenic lake with boat rides offering views of palaces and ghats.

landmarks.name: City Palace
landmarks.description: Historic complex overlooking Lake Pichola, known for its grandeur.

landmarks.name: Sajjangarh Palace
landmarks.description: Also known as Monsoon Palace, offers panoramic views of the city.

activities.name: Boat Ride on Lake Pichola
activities.description: Evening boat ride with views of Jag Mandir and City Palace.

activities.name: Folk Dance Show
activities.description: Watch traditional Rajasthani dance at Bagore Ki Haveli.

travelTips: Take early morning boat rides for fewer crowds
Explore hidden ghats for local interaction
healthAndSafety: Drink bottled water; watch out for steep palace steps.
aiGeneratedSummary: Udaipur is a picturesque destination perfect for couples and culture seekers, offering a mix of serene lakes and majestic palaces.

title: Jodhpur
description: The Blue City, famous for its blue houses, massive Mehrangarh Fort, and desert charm.
reviewSummary: A city that blends desert vibes with stunning historical architecture.

landmarks.name: Mehrangarh Fort
landmarks.description: A colossal fort with museums, galleries, and panoramic city views.

landmarks.name: Jaswant Thada
landmarks.description: A white marble cenotaph offering peace and serenity.

landmarks.name: Clock Tower and Sardar Market
landmarks.description: Bustling market for spices, handicrafts, and local life.

activities.name: Zipline at Mehrangarh
activities.description: Fly over the fort and desert landscape.

activities.name: Camel Safari
activities.description: Experience the Thar Desert on a traditional camel ride.

travelTips: Start your day early to avoid heat
aiGeneratedSummary: Jodhpur blends desert magic with regal architecture, making it an essential stop in Rajasthan’s golden triangle.

title: Kerala Backwaters
description: A network of lagoons and lakes offering tranquil houseboat experiences.
reviewSummary: Peaceful and scenic, perfect for relaxation and nature lovers.

landmarks.name: Alleppey Boat Jetty
landmarks.description: Main starting point for houseboat cruises.

landmarks.name: Vembanad Lake
landmarks.description: Largest lake in Kerala, offering beautiful views.

landmarks.name: Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary
landmarks.description: A paradise for bird watchers.

activities.name: Houseboat Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a relaxing cruise through the backwaters.

activities.name: Canoeing
activities.description: Explore narrow canals by canoe.

activities.name: Fishing Experience
activities.description: Try traditional fishing methods with locals.

activities.name: Kerala Cuisine Tasting
activities.description: Sample authentic Kerala dishes.

healthAndSafety: Stay hydrated; use mosquito nets at night.
aiGeneratedSummary: The Kerala Backwaters offer a unique, peaceful experience with scenic waterways and vibrant local culture.

title: Alleppey
description: Known as the 'Venice of the East', Alleppey is famed for its tranquil backwaters, houseboat cruises, and vibrant coastal culture.
reviewSummary: A serene destination offering picturesque backwaters, sandy beaches, and rich cultural experiences.

landmarks.name: Alappuzha Beach
landmarks.description: A scenic beach known for its historic pier and lighthouse, offering stunning sunset views.

landmarks.name: Alappuzha Lighthouse
landmarks.description: An iconic 19th-century lighthouse offering panoramic views of the Arabian Sea.

landmarks.name: Krishnapuram Palace
landmarks.description: A historic palace known for its traditional Kerala architecture and mural paintings.

activities.name: Houseboat Cruise
activities.description: Experience the serene backwaters aboard a traditional houseboat with meals and overnight stay.

activities.name: Evening Beach Walk
activities.description: Stroll along Alappuzha Beach and enjoy the sunset over the Arabian Sea.

activities.name: Coir Museum Visit
activities.description: Learn about the traditional coir industry and its significance in Kerala's culture.

travelTips: Book houseboats in advance during peak season.
Carry mosquito repellent for evening outings.
Respect local customs and dress modestly.
healthAndSafety: Stay hydrated; avoid street food if unsure.
aiGeneratedSummary: Alleppey offers a blend of tranquil backwaters, cultural landmarks, and coastal charm, making it a perfect getaway for relaxation and exploration.

activities: Check-in to houseboat and begin backwater cruise
Visit Alappuzha Beach and Lighthouse in the evening

title: Kumarakom
description: A tranquil village on the banks of Vembanad Lake, renowned for its bird sanctuary, backwaters, and lush landscapes.
reviewSummary: Kumarakom captivates with its serene backwaters, rich avian life, and authentic Kerala village experience.

landmarks.name: Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary
landmarks.description: A haven for bird watchers, home to numerous migratory and native bird species.

landmarks.name: Vembanad Lake Viewpoint
landmarks.description: Scenic views of India’s longest lake with options for boating and sunset cruises.

landmarks.name: Pathiramanal Island
landmarks.description: A small, lush island on Vembanad Lake rich in flora and fauna, accessible by boat.

activities.name: Bird Watching at Sanctuary
activities.description: Spot rare migratory birds including Siberian cranes, herons, and kingfishers.

activities.name: Canoe Ride through Canals
activities.description: Glide through narrow canals of Kumarakom in a traditional canoe.

activities.name: Ayurvedic Spa Therapy
activities.description: Rejuvenate with authentic Kerala-style Ayurvedic massage therapies.

travelTips: Visit the bird sanctuary early in the morning for best sightings.
Book canoe rides through local guides for an authentic experience.
healthAndSafety: Wear insect repellent near water bodies; ensure drinking water is purified.
aiGeneratedSummary: Kumarakom blends serene backwaters with rich birdlife, making it ideal for nature lovers and those seeking peace and rejuvenation.

activities: Bird watching at Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary
Relax with an Ayurvedic spa therapy

title: Goa
description: Famous for its beaches, nightlife, and Portuguese heritage.
reviewSummary: Perfect blend of beach fun, history, and vibrant culture.

landmarks.name: Baga Beach
landmarks.description: Popular beach known for water sports and nightlife.

landmarks.name: Fort Aguada
landmarks.description: Historic Portuguese fort overlooking the Arabian Sea.

landmarks.name: Old Goa Churches
landmarks.description: UNESCO World Heritage site featuring Baroque churches.

activities.name: Scuba Diving
activities.description: Explore underwater marine life along Goa's coast.

activities.name: Beach Party
activities.description: Join the vibrant nightlife and beach parties at night.

activities.name: Heritage Walk
activities.description: Explore the Portuguese heritage and colonial architecture.

activities.name: Local Food Tour
activities.description: Taste Goan seafood and local delicacies.

healthAndSafety: Drink bottled water; be cautious with nightlife.
aiGeneratedSummary: Goa is a perfect mix of sun, sand, and culture with vibrant nightlife and historical sites.

title: Varanasi
description: One of the world's oldest living cities, sacred on the banks of the Ganges.
reviewSummary: Spiritual and vibrant, with rituals on the ghats and historic temples.

landmarks.name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
landmarks.description: One of the holiest Hindu temples dedicated to Lord Shiva.

landmarks.name: Dasaswamedh Ghat
landmarks.description: Famous ghat on the Ganges known for evening aarti ceremonies.

landmarks.name: Banaras Hindu University
landmarks.description: One of Asia's largest residential universities with beautiful campus.

activities.name: Boating on the Ganges
activities.description: Experience sunrise or sunset boat rides on the sacred river.

activities.name: Evening Aarti Ceremony
activities.description: Witness the spectacular aarti ritual at the ghats.

activities.name: Old City Heritage Walk
activities.description: Explore narrow lanes, temples, and markets of ancient Varanasi.

activities.name: Banarasi Saree Shopping
activities.description: Buy exquisite silk sarees famous worldwide.

healthAndSafety: Drink bottled water; be cautious in crowded places.
aiGeneratedSummary: Varanasi offers a deeply spiritual experience on the banks of the Ganges, with vibrant rituals and rich heritage.

title: Tawang
description: A serene mountain town known for its ancient monastery, snow-covered peaks, and vibrant Tibetan culture.
reviewSummary: A mystical Himalayan retreat, perfect for spiritual seekers and mountain lovers.

landmarks.name: Tawang Monastery
landmarks.description: India’s largest and Asia’s second-largest monastery, perched on a hill overlooking the Tawang valley.

landmarks.name: Sela Pass
landmarks.description: A breathtaking high-altitude mountain pass with a glacial lake.

activities.name: Monastery Tour
activities.description: Explore ancient Buddhist traditions at the iconic Tawang Monastery.

activities.name: Scenic Mountain Drive to Sela Pass
activities.description: Drive through winding roads and dramatic mountain landscapes.

travelTips: Carry winter gear even in summer.
Respect monastery etiquette — silence and dress modestly.
Inner Line Permit (ILP) is required for entry to Arunachal Pradesh.
healthAndSafety: Prepare for high altitudes; carry medication for AMS if needed.
aiGeneratedSummary: Tawang is a spiritual Himalayan hideaway offering majestic views, cultural immersion, and peace in abundance.

title: Shillong
description: Known as the ‘Scotland of the East’, Shillong boasts rolling hills, waterfalls, and vibrant culture.
reviewSummary: Shillong blends modernity and tradition, nature and music, all in a cool highland setting.

landmarks.name: Elephant Falls
landmarks.description: A multi-tiered waterfall nestled in lush greenery, perfect for nature walks.

activities.name: Shillong Live Music Pubs
activities.description: Catch live rock and blues performances in the heart of Meghalaya’s capital.

reviewSummary: Shillong blends modernity and tradition, nature and music, all in a cool highland setting.

title: Puri
description: A sacred coastal city known for the Jagannath Temple and the annual Rath Yatra festival.
reviewSummary: A coastal pilgrimage town where faith meets the ocean breeze.

landmarks.name: Jagannath Temple
landmarks.description: One of the four sacred Char Dham pilgrimage sites dedicated to Lord Jagannath.

landmarks.name: Puri Beach
landmarks.description: A vibrant beach popular for sunrise views and camel rides.

activities.name: Jagannath Temple Darshan
activities.description: Experience divine blessings at one of India’s holiest temples.

activities.name: Evening Beach Walk
activities.description: Enjoy the breeze and vibrant local life along the shoreline.

travelTips: Avoid visiting during Rath Yatra if you don’t like crowds.
Non-Hindus are not allowed inside the main temple.
visaRequirements: Standard Indian visa for foreign nationals.
healthAndSafety: Be cautious of strong beach currents. Dress modestly at temples.
aiGeneratedSummary: Puri is a spiritual and scenic getaway, blending culture and coast in one divine destination.

title: Konark
description: Home to the iconic Sun Temple, a UNESCO World Heritage Site renowned for its chariot-shaped architecture.
reviewSummary: A treasure trove of Indian temple architecture and solar mythology.

landmarks.name: Sun Temple
landmarks.description: A 13th-century marvel shaped like a colossal chariot dedicated to the Sun God.

activities.name: Konark Dance Festival
activities.description: Witness classical Indian dance in a grand temple backdrop.

title: Bhubaneswar
description: The ‘Temple City’ of India, blending ancient architecture with a modern urban vibe.
reviewSummary: A cultural capital where spirituality meets urban planning.

landmarks.name: Lingaraj Temple
landmarks.description: An architectural masterpiece dedicated to Lord Shiva, built in the 11th century.

activities.name: Old Town Heritage Walk
activities.description: Explore centuries-old temples and stories of Kalinga architecture.
